trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the githzerai fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Strike
entries: The githzerai makes one Unarmed Strike attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The githzerai teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

legendary.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The githzerai casts the {@spell reverse gravity} spell, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell has the normal effect, except that the githzerai can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):
